skills.name: Headbutt
skills.description: Attacks with the horns and provokes for 1 turn with a 50% chance. The provoke effect is guaranteed if the attack lands as a Critical Hit.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skills.name: Chop
skills.description: Attacks with an axe and decreases the target's Attack Bar by 50%. Additionally, your Attack Bar will be increased by 50% if you land a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skills.name: Push
skills.description: Charges towards the enemy to attack and removes all beneficial effects on the target. Stuns the enemy for 1 turn when you get a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns
